cart.name: 3 Hand Sanitizers Mystic Foliage
cart.about: Cleanse and moisturize your hands with this formula with Aloe Vera that eliminates 99.99% of bacteria. This Mystic Foliage collection will leave your hands delicately scented and remind you of the warmness of the tropics and the exotic flora.
cart.howToUse:
1.Spray until your hands are sufficiently covered 
 2.Shuffle fingertips in palm.
 3.Rub your hands inside and out.
 4.Rub between your fingers.
 5.Enjoy clean and soft hands.
cart.ingredients:
Hand Sanitizer Forest Grace: Green energy and the effervescence of fruit.
  Hand Sanitizer Wild Orchid: Wild orchids around the warmth of vanilla flower and Indian Sandalwood.
  Hand Sanitizer Tales of Lotus:Delicate water petals are covered with white figs and dry fruit notes.

cart.name: Full Skin Care Routine - for Dry Skin
cart.about: Make up your full daily skincare routine
cart.howToUse:
1.Face Cleanser: Apply morning and evening, massaging onto wet skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse thoroughly with water.
  2.Face Cream: Apply and massage morning and/or night on cleansed skin.
 3.Face Serum :Apply morning and evening after cleansing and drying the skin, massaging gently until completely absorbed.
cart.ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA, Parfum(Fragrance), Inulin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Fructose, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-2.
